Title: Anatomy of a Lye
Plot: Grissom and Sara investigate when a man's body, which has been doused with lye, is found buried in a park. Nick tries to determine how a hiker apparently drowned in a desert.
GuestStars: Jeffrey D. Sams, Gabriel Olds, Anthony Starke, Zachary Quinto, Adam Nelson, J. Marvin Campbell, Cathy Herd, Lyndon Smith, Paul Schackman
